WRITING.TEXT: I #8217;m seeing a psychiatrist and have talked to my gynecologist about this. I #8217;m currently trying to find the right antidepressant bc the ones I #8217;ve been on in the past and currently haven #8217;t helped. I might consider changing my bc to something different to see if that changes anything. Thank you for sharing this with me, I can already tell this site is going to be very comforting for me. Good luck to you as well!
I #8217;ve been on BC for so many years, the same kind though so I do eventually want to talk to my dr about changing them up. Thank you for letting me know your experience! Take care

Thank you so much for all of this. I need to start motivating myself to work out because I know that would change a lot. I get in these moods where I just like to bathe in self pity because it #8217;s what I #8217;m used to and anything else is uncomfortable for me, if that makes any sense. I also go through phases where I #8217;ll be super into taking vitamins but then I just stop. You mentioning this has actually motivated me to continue with start taking them again so thank you! I actually talked to my psychiatrist about CBD oil and he was really for it and has seen it being a lot of success with people. I bought my first bottle from some random head shop so now I know I need to go somewhere else. Thank you for mentioning the CBD subreddit, I #8217;m for sure going to check it out. Your kindness means a lot :)

I know I need to stop drinking, it #8217;s recently become a nasty habit that I turn to late at night when I mentally don #8217;t feel well. I need a lifestyle change, and the things you have suggested are very helpful so thank you for that. I need to stop making excuses for myself and actually go through with things I say I #8217;m going to do because I #8217;ve been this way for far too long and I need a change. I appreciate all your kind words and advice, take care!

I #8217;ve tried a fidget cube as well! I #8217;d didn #8217;t do much for me though. Even when I put my hair up I have the impulse to take it down and just start picking. It #8217;s like my hands always need to be doing something, whether it #8217;s with my hair or ripping apart my cuticles. I think I need to start meditating.

You #8217;re right about this, I had my hair shorter for a bit and it made it much harder to pick at. I think this week I #8217;m going to go for a shoulder length cut. Thanks for this and good luck to you too!
I do plan on getting my haircut somewhat soon, I think it will help. Thank you for your input!

That #8217;s very sweet of you, I appreciate that. I just hate the looks I get in class from professors or classmates, they don #8217;t get it, I #8217;m trying all sorts of things to get my mind at ease and to relax my hands. Best wishes and take care!

It sounds corny as hell but my boyfriend has helped me through all my demons, he writes me things that make me feel okay about myself and situation. I #8217;m just the kind of girl who likes to reread texts from him when I #8217;m down.

My bf literally commented last week on how proud of me he was that I haven #8217;t don #8217;t anything physically destructive to myself. I cut my leg open pretty severely last night. I feel like a fraud in a way. Just know you #8217;re not alone, hang in there okay? #10083; #65039;
